app-label.help: Sets a device friendly name displayed on the LCD

fcc-wipe.help: Wipe the FCC credentials stored on the device

geo-accuracy.help: Sets the accuracy of geo-lat and geo-lon, in meters

geo-lat.help: Sets the device latitude, from -90.0 to 90.0

geo-long.help: Sets the device longitude, from -180 to 180

use-spi-flash.help: Set to true to use SPI Flash or false to use SD card.

version.help: Display this version string on the device

wifi-debug.help: Enable debug output for WiFi drivers

wifi-password.help: An optional password for wifi security authentication

wifi-rx.help: RX pin for serial connection to external device

wifi-security.help: WPA, WPA2, WPA/WPA2, WEP, NONE, OPEN

wifi-ssid.help: The SSID to connect to if using a WiFi interface

wifi-tx.help: TX pin for serial connection to external device
